title: Enduro Racer (USA, Europe)
plot: Enduro Racer is a racing game where players ride dirt bikes and compete in off-road races. The game features multiple courses and obstacles to navigate.

title: Kenseiden (USA, Europe)
plot: Kenseiden is an action game where players control a warrior who must fight against demons and other supernatural enemies. The game features multiple levels and bosses.

title: R-Type (World)
plot: R-Type is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game where players pilot a spaceship and battle against an alien invasion. The game features power-ups and boss battles.

title: Shinobi (USA, Europe)
plot: Shinobi is an action game where players control a ninja who must rescue hostages and defeat enemies. The game features multiple levels and boss battles.

title: Wonder Boy (USA, Europe)
plot: Wonder Boy is a platformer game where players control a young boy who must navigate through various levels and defeat enemies. The game features power-ups and boss battles.

title: Wonder Boy III - The Dragons Trap (USA, Europe)
image: Data/Covers/Wonder Boy III - The Dragons Trap (USA, Europe).jpg
plot: Dragon's Trap is an adventure game where players control a hero who has been cursed and transformed into a dragon. The game features multiple levels and puzzles to solve.
file: Data/Roms/Wonder Boy III - The Dragons Trap (USA, Europe).html

title: Golden Axe (World)
plot: Golden Axe is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game where players control one of three heroes and battle against enemies and bosses. The game features magic spells and mounts to ride.

title: Rambo III (World)
plot: Rambo III is a top-down shooter game where players control John Rambo and battle against enemy soldiers and vehicles. The game features power-ups and boss battles.

title: Revenge of Shinobi, The (USA, Europe)
plot: The Revenge of Shinobi is an action game where players control a ninja who must rescue his kidnapped lover and defeat a criminal organization. The game features multiple levels and bosses.

title: Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (USA)
image: Data/Covers/Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (USA).jpg
plot: Shinobi III is an action game where players control a ninja who must rescue his fellow ninjas and defeat enemies. The game features multiple levels and boss battles.
file: Data/Roms/Shinobi III - Return of the Ninja Master (USA).html

title: Streets of Rage 2 (USA)
plot: Streets of Rage 2 is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game where players control one of four heroes and battle against enemies and bosses. The game features special moves and a soundtrack by Yuzo Koshiro.

title: Streets of Rage 3 (USA)
plot: Streets of Rage 3 is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game where players control one of four heroes and battle against enemies and bosses. The game features special moves and a branching storyline.

title: Contra (USA)
plot: Contra is a side-scrolling run and gun game where players control soldiers and battle against alien forces. The game features power-ups and boss battles.

title: Excitebike (Japan, USA)
plot: Excitebike is a motocross racing game where players control a motorcycle and race against other riders on various tracks. The game features ramps and obstacles to jump over.

title: Jackal (USA)
plot: Jackal is a top-down action game where players control a military jeep and must rescue prisoners of war while battling enemy forces and avoiding obstacles.

title: Kung Fu (Japan, USA)
plot: Kung Fu is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game where players control a martial artist and battle against enemies to rescue his girlfriend. The game features multiple levels and boss battles.

title: Legend of Zelda, The (USA)
plot: The Legend of Zelda is an action-adventure game where players control Link and navigate through various dungeons to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat the evil Ganon.

title: Metroid (USA)
plot: Metroid is a side-scrolling action-adventure game where players control Samus Aran and explore an alien planet to defeat the Space Pirates and their leader, Mother Brain.

title: Mike Tysons Punch-Out!! (Japan, USA)
plot: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! is a boxing game where players control Little Mac and battle against various opponents to become the champion. The game features special moves and boss battles.

title: Super Mario Bros. (World)
plot: Super Mario Bros. is a side-scrolling platformer game where players control Mario and navigate through various levels to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser. The game features power-ups and boss battles.

title: Super Mario Bros. 2 (USA)
plot: Super Mario Bros. 2 is a side-scrolling platformer game where players control Mario, Luigi, Toad, or Princess Toadstool and navigate through various levels to defeat Wart and his minions. The game features different playable characters and a unique gameplay style.

title: Super Mario Bros. 3 (USA)
plot: Super Mario Bros. 3 is a side-scrolling platformer game where players control Mario and navigate through various worlds to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser and his Koopalings. The game features power-ups and a world map.
